title: Enlightenment and growth of abolition movement

content.question: Which of the following contributed the most to the growth of the movement to abolish slavery in the Atlantic world?

choices.label: Increased availability of Asian indentured labor
The adaptation of Enlightenment ideas challenging established social hierarchies
The efforts of industrialists to create a more flexible workforce
A decline in the number of enslaved persons being taken from Africa

content.answer: The adaptation of Enlightenment ideas challenging established social hierarchies

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
